bike.description: Monoque C-4 carbon with custom weave carbon strands, Integrated aluminum cupped head tube, Double water bottle mounts.

components.description: TruVativ Rouleur Double GXP w/ Integrated spindle, 6061 forged alloy with 7075 CNC 36/50T Chainrings
Shimano Ultegra Shifter/Brake, Flight Deck compatible
V.P. 1 1/8" Integrated Road, with convex hollow alloy spacer
C-4 carbon  stays with shaped ride tuned Energy Transfer Chainstay, cold forged dropout with replaceable hanger
Ritchey Logic Comp 31.8mm Road, 7075 Triple Butted Alloy
FC-440 Fuji Carbon Monocoque Integrated 1 1/8" Carbon steerer , 420g
Shimano Ultegra shifter/brake, 20-speed Flight Deck compatible
Selle Italia C2 Trans Am SE
